A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie ever. You destroyed Luke after we waited since 1983 for his return. Everything he faught for you pissed on. Thanks Disney. Just give us some decent writing and character development and we will eat that up all day. Own up to your mistakes and make things better.
